title: Crime Alert 07.09.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.09.19
description:
Mom charged after drowning two sons. Tennessee boy charged after stabbing his brother. Man throws lit firecrackers under a child's bed, claims it was a prank gone wrong. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
